sense.def:
Kdor je
sensitive to other people's problems and feelings
, razume težave in občutke drugih in se jih zaveda.

seg.quote: We're trying to make people more sensitive to the difficulties faced by working mothers.
Her remarks showed a lack of sensitivity.

sense.def:
Kdor je
sensitive about something
, je hitro prizadet ali zaskrbljen zaradi nečesa.

seg.quote: You really must stop being so sensitive about your accent.

sense.def:
Kadar je téma ali vprašanje
sensitive
, se ga moramo lotiti previdno, ker bo verjetno povzročilo nesoglasja med ljudmi ali jih razburilo.

seg.quote: This is one of the most sensitive issues that the government faces.

sense.def:
Kar je
sensitive to a physical force, substance, or condition
, se pod vplivom fizične sile, snovi ali okoliščin zlahka spremeni ali poškoduje.

seg.quote: Children's bones are very sensitive to radiation.
...the sensitivity of the lining of the nasal cavity.

sense.def:
Znanstvena naprava, ki je
sensitive
, lahko meri ali zapisuje zelo majhne spremembe.
